agentAddress: 56 Pennethorne Road Peckham London SE15 5TQ United Kingdom
proposal: Non material amendment of planning permission ref. no. 24/AP/1002 - Conversion to form 2 flats, in place of original 3 flats. Ground floor to basement stair flight to be reintroduced to its original historic position. Alterations to the front external steps and front facade. The amendment proposes to change the position of the proposed basement-to-ground-floor staircase. The initial proposal joined the new flight of stairs with the existing staircase in the centre of the building but will now connect the ground floor living room on the north side of the house, with the living room/studio space in the basement below.
